member.name: T:System.Security.Claims.Claim
member.summary: Represents a claim.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.Claim.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified claim type, and value.
member.param: The claim type.
The claim value.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.Claim.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified claim type, value, and value type.
member.param: The claim type.
The claim value.
The claim value type. If this parameter is null, then is used.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.Claim.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified claim type, value, value type, and issuer.
member.param: The claim type.
The claim value.
The claim value type. If this parameter is null, then is used.
The claim issuer. If this parameter is empty or null, then is used.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.Claim.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified claim type, value, value type, issuer, and original issuer.
member.param: The claim type.
The claim value.
The claim value type. If this parameter is null, then is used.
The claim issuer. If this parameter is empty or null, then is used.
The original issuer of the claim. If this parameter is empty or null, then the property is set to the value of the property.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.Claim.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified claim type, value, value type, issuer, original issuer and subject.
member.param: The claim type.
The claim value.
The claim value type. If this parameter is null, then is used.
The claim issuer. If this parameter is empty or null, then is used.
The original issuer of the claim. If this parameter is empty or null, then the property is set to the value of the property.
The subject that this claim describes.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Clone
member.summary: Returns a new object copied from this object. The new claim does not have a subject.
member.returns: The new claim object.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Clone(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity)
member.summary: Returns a new object copied from this object. The subject of the new claim is set to the specified ClaimsIdentity.
member.returns: The new claim object.
member.param: The intended subject of the new claim.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Issuer
member.summary: Gets the issuer of the claim.
member.returns: A name that refers to the issuer of the claim.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.Claim.OriginalIssuer
member.summary: Gets the original issuer of the claim.
member.returns: A name that refers to the original issuer of the claim.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Properties
member.summary: Gets a dictionary that contains additional properties associated with this claim.
member.returns: A dictionary that contains additional properties associated with the claim. The properties are represented as name-value pairs.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Subject
member.summary: Gets the subject of the claim.
member.returns: The subject of the claim.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.Claim.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of this object.
member.returns: The string representation of this object.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Type
member.summary: Gets the claim type of the claim.
member.returns: The claim type.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.Claim.Value
member.summary: Gets the value of the claim.
member.returns: The claim value.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.Claim.ValueType
member.summary: Gets the value type of the claim.
member.returns: The claim value type.

member.name: T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity
member.summary: Represents a claims-based identity.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an empty claims collection.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using an enumerated collection of objects.
member.param: The claims with which to populate the claims identity.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Security.Claims.Claim},System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified claims and authentication type.
member.param: The claims with which to populate the claims identity.
The type of authentication used.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified, claims, authentication type, name claim type, and role claim type.
member.param: The claims with which to populate the claims identity.
The type of authentication used.
The claim type to use for name claims.
The claim type to use for role claims.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the name and authentication type from the specified .
member.param: The identity from which to base the new claims identity.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified claims and the specified .
member.param: The identity from which to base the new claims identity.
The claims with which to populate the claims identity.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified using the specified claims, authentication type, name claim type, and role claim type.
member.param: The identity from which to base the new claims identity.
The claims with which to populate the new claims identity.
The type of authentication used.
The claim type to use for name claims.
The claim type to use for role claims.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with an empty claims collection and the specified authentication type.
member.param: The type of authentication used.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified authentication type, name claim type, and role claim type.
member.param: The type of authentication used.
The claim type to use for name claims.
The claim type to use for role claims.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Actor
member.summary: Gets or sets the identity of the calling party that was granted delegation rights.
member.returns: The calling party that was granted delegation rights.
member.exception: An attempt to set the property to the current instance occurs.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.AddClaim(System.Security.Claims.Claim)
member.summary: Adds a single claim to this claims identity.
member.param: The claim to add.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.AddClaims(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Adds a list of claims to this claims identity.
member.param: The claims to add.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.AuthenticationType
member.summary: Gets the authentication type.
member.returns: The authentication type.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.BootstrapContext
member.summary: Gets or sets the token that was used to create this claims identity.
member.returns: The bootstrap context.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Claims
member.summary: Gets the claims associated with this claims identity.
member.returns: The collection of claims associated with this claims identity.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Clone
member.summary: Returns a new copied from this claims identity.
member.returns: A copy of the current instance.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.DefaultIssuer
member.summary: The default issuer; “LOCAL AUTHORITY”.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.DefaultNameClaimType
member.summary: The default name claim type; .

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.DefaultRoleClaimType
member.summary: The default role claim type; .

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.FindAll(System.Predicate{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Retrieves all of the claims that are matched by the specified predicate.
member.returns: The matching claims. The list is read-only.
member.param: The function that performs the matching logic.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.FindAll(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all of the claims that have the specified claim type.
member.returns: The matching claims. The list is read-only.
member.param: The claim type against which to match claims.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.FindFirst(System.Predicate{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Retrieves the first claim that is matched by the specified predicate.
member.returns: The first matching claim or null if no match is found.
member.param: The function that performs the matching logic.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.FindFirst(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the first claim with the specified claim type.
member.returns: The first matching claim or null if no match is found.
member.param: The claim type to match.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.HasClaim(System.Predicate{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Determines whether this claims identity has a claim that is matched by the specified predicate.
member.returns: true if a matching claim exists; otherwise, false.
member.param: The function that performs the matching logic.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.HasClaim(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether this claims identity has a claim with the specified claim type and value.
member.returns: true if a match is found; otherwise, false.
member.param: The type of the claim to match.
The value of the claim to match.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.IsAuthenticated
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates whether the identity has been authenticated.
member.returns: true if the identity has been authenticated; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Label
member.summary: Gets or sets the label for this claims identity.
member.returns: The label.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.Name
member.summary: Gets the name of this claims identity.
member.returns: The name or null.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.NameClaimType
member.summary: Gets the claim type that is used to determine which claims provide the value for the property of this claims identity.
member.returns: The name claim type.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.RemoveClaim(System.Security.Claims.Claim)
member.summary: Attempts to remove a claim from the claims identity.
member.param: The claim to remove.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.RoleClaimType
member.summary: Gets the claim type that will be interpreted as a .NET Framework role among the claims in this claims identity.
member.returns: The role claim type.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity.TryRemoveClaim(System.Security.Claims.Claim)
member.summary: Attempts to remove a claim from the claims identity.
member.returns: true if the claim was successfully removed; otherwise, false.
member.param: The claim to remove.

member.name: T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal
member.summary: An implementation that supports multiple claims-based identities.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.#ctor(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified claims identities.
member.param: The identities from which to initialize the new claims principal.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.#ctor(System.Security.Principal.IIdentity)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified identity.
member.param: The identity from which to initialize the new claims principal.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the specified principal.
member.param: The principal from which to initialize the new claims principal.

member.summary: Adds the specified claims identities to this claims principal.
member.param: The claims identities to add.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.AddIdentity(System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity)
member.summary: Adds the specified claims identity to this claims principal.
member.param: The claims identity to add.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Claims
member.summary: Gets a collection that contains all of the claims from all of the claims identities associated with this claims principal.
member.returns: The claims associated with this principal.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.ClaimsPrincipalSelector
member.summary: Gets and sets the delegate used to select the claims principal returned by the property.
member.returns: The delegate. The default is null.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Current
member.summary: Gets the current claims principal.
member.returns: The current claims principal.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.FindAll(System.Predicate{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Retrieves all of the claims that are matched by the specified predicate.
member.returns: The matching claims.
member.param: The function that performs the matching logic.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.FindAll(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all or the claims that have the specified claim type.
member.returns: The matching claims.
member.param: The claim type against which to match claims.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.FindFirst(System.Predicate{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Retrieves the first claim that is matched by the specified predicate.
member.returns: The first matching claim or null if no match is found.
member.param: The function that performs the matching logic.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.FindFirst(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the first claim with the specified claim type.
member.returns: The first matching claim or null if no match is found.
member.param: The claim type to match.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.HasClaim(System.Predicate{System.Security.Claims.Claim})
member.summary: Determines whether any of the claims identities associated with this claims principal contains a claim that is matched by the specified predicate.
member.returns: true if a matching claim exists; otherwise, false.
member.param: The function that performs the matching logic.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.HasClaim(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether any of the claims identities associated with this claims principal contains a claim with the specified claim type and value.
member.returns: true if a matching claim exists; otherwise, false.
member.param: The type of the claim to match.
The value of the claim to match.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Identities
member.summary: Gets a collection that contains all of the claims identities associated with this claims principal.
member.returns: The collection of claims identities.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.Identity
member.summary: Gets the primary claims identity associated with this claims principal.
member.returns: The primary claims identity associated with this claims principal.

member.name: M:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.IsInRole(System.String)
member.summary: Returns a value that indicates whether the entity (user) represented by this claims principal is in the specified role.
member.returns: true if claims principal is in the specified role; otherwise, false.
member.param: The role for which to check.

member.name: P:System.Security.Claims.ClaimsPrincipal.PrimaryIdentitySelector
member.summary: Gets and sets the delegate used to select the claims identity returned by the property.
member.returns: The delegate. The default is null.

member.name: T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes
member.summary: Defines constants for the well-known claim types that can be assigned to a subject. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Actor
member.summary: http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2009/09/identity/claims/actor.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Anonymous
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the anonymous user; http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/anonymous.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Authentication
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies details about whether an identity is authenticated, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authenticated.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationInstant
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the instant at which an entity was authenticated; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/authenticationinstant.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthenticationMethod
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the method with which an entity was authenticated; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/authenticationmethod.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.AuthorizationDecision
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies an authorization decision on an entity; http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/authorizationdecision.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.CookiePath
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the cookie path; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/cookiepath.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Country
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the country/region in which an entity resides, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/country.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.DateOfBirth
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the date of birth of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dateofbirth.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.DenyOnlyPrimaryGroupSid
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the deny-only primary group SID on an entity; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/denyonlyprimarygroupsid. A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.DenyOnlyPrimarySid
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the deny-only primary SID on an entity; http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/denyonlyprimarysid. A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.DenyOnlySid
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies a deny-only security identifier (SID) for an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/denyonlysid. A deny-only SID denies the specified entity to a securable object.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.DenyOnlyWindowsDeviceGroup
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/denyonlywindowsdevicegroup.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Dns
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the DNS name associated with the computer name or with the alternative name of either the subject or issuer of an X.509 certificate, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/dns.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Dsa
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/dsa.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Email
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the email address of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/email.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Expiration
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/expiration.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Expired
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/expired.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Gender
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the gender of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/gender.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.GivenName
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the given name of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.GroupSid
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the SID for the group of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/groupsid.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Hash
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies a hash value, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/hash.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.HomePhone
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the home phone number of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/homephone.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.IsPersistent
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/ispersistent.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Locality
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the locale in which an entity resides, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/locality.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.MobilePhone
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the mobile phone number of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/mobilephone.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Name
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/name.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.NameIdentifier
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the name of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/nameidentifier.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.OtherPhone
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the alternative phone number of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/otherphone.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.PostalCode
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the postal code of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/postalcode.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.PrimaryGroupSid
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the primary group SID of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/primarygroupsid.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.PrimarySid
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the primary SID of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/primarysid.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Role
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the role of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/role.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Rsa
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies an RSA key, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/rsa.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.SerialNumber
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies a serial number, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/serialnumber.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Sid
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies a security identifier (SID), http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/sid.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Spn
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies a service principal name (SPN) claim, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/spn.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.StateOrProvince
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the state or province in which an entity resides, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/stateorprovince.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.StreetAddress
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the street address of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/streetaddress.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Surname
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the surname of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/surname.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.System
member.summary: The URI for a claim that identifies the system entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/system.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Thumbprint
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies a thumbprint, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/thumbprint. A thumbprint is a globally unique SHA-1 hash of an X.509 certificate.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Upn
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies a user principal name (UPN), http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/upn.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Uri
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies a URI, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/uri.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.UserData
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/userdata.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Version
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/version.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.Webpage
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the webpage of an entity, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/webpage.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.WindowsAccountName
member.summary: The URI for a claim that specifies the Windows domain account name of an entity, http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsaccountname.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.WindowsDeviceClaim
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsdeviceclaim.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.WindowsDeviceGroup
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsdevicegroup.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.WindowsFqbnVersion
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsfqbnversion.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.WindowsSubAuthority
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowssubauthority.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.WindowsUserClaim
member.summary: http://schemas.microsoft.com/ws/2008/06/identity/claims/windowsuserclaim.

member.name: F:System.Security.Claims.ClaimTypes.X500DistinguishedName
member.summary: The URI for a distinguished name claim of an X.509 certificate, http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/x500distinguishedname. The X.500 standard defines the methodology for defining distinguished names that are used by X.509 certificates.

member.name: T:System.Security.Claims.ClaimValueTypes
